MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra was tasked with heading into the Mycenaean Ruins to search for a stolen bag of poison for the priestesses of Kythera Island|Kythera.'
MemoryInfobox.concurrent:
All Bonds Will Break
The Handmaiden's Story

General_Description: '''Pick Your Poison''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra helped [[Diona]] recover a stolen bag of [[poison]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached the [[Mycenaean Ruins]] south of [[Kythera Town]]. *'''Kassandra:''' ''These look like the ruins Diona spoke about. Best be on my guard.'' With the help of [[Ikaros]], she found the bag of poisons stolen from Diona. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I see it.'' She infiltrated the ruins, dealt with the bandits as she saw fit, and retrieved the poisons, along with [[Kytheran Belt]]. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Poison... a coward's weapon.
Diona will want this back.'' Kassandra left the ruins behind and returned to the city. (Dialogue with Diona concludes over the course of [[Place in the Kosmos]]/[[In a Rush]])
Section_Outcome: Kassandra retrieved the poisons stolen from Diona.
